page.title: 02Schools in the 'D' Block.
page.content: There are ten schools in the area ranging from a special school, a high school and various junior schools. Exeter College also has annexes in the area. Six schools surveyed the 'D' block and produced the written material. They were : {St. James High School.}A 12-16 mixed comprehensive with about 620 pupils. {Stoke Hill Middle School.}An 8-12 mixed school with about 370 pupils. {Ladysmith Middle School.}An 8-12 mixed school with about 432 pupils. {Ladysmith First School.}A 5-8 mixed school with about 380 pupils. {Whipton Barton Middle School.}An 8-12 mixed school with about 360 pupils. {Whipton Barton First School.}A 5-8 mixed school with about 300 pupils. After the age of 16 pupils can go on to Exeter College.
